originalText.text: I visited Dr Cooper's practice last week for the first time on the recommendation of a colleague and must say I was very impressed. The staff were warm and courteous, there was a very short wait time once I arrived for my appointment, and the doctor took the time to answer my questions and review various options for me. I also did not feel pressured to make an immediate decision as to purchasing glasses or scheduling a follow up for contact fitting. I will definitely be returning.

originalText.text: I got my complete eye check-up with Dr. Jennifer Colavito this week. I could not have had a more perfect experience. The wait time was reasonable, the reception staff was courteous and the 2 other members of the medical staff who saw me prior to the doctor were both friendly but professional. Dr. Colavito, however, is the main reason I will never go to another eye doctor.She is simply exceptional-very thorough in her exam, explains things in a way that is easy to understand, obviously knows her job and keeps up-to-date with the latest developments and advances in her field. In addition, she is a warm and lovely human being who makes going to the doctor's office, a pleasure.

originalText.text: Great experience and very easy. Everyone in the office is helpful and professional. Dr. Borukhov takes the time to listen and truly cares about his patients. I would recommend this office to friends and family.

text.text: Great experience and very easy. Everyone in the office is helpful and professional. Dr. Borukhov takes the time to listen and truly cares about his patients. I would recommend this office to friends and family.

originalText.text:
I highly recommend Cooper Eye Care.  Dr. Cooper and Dr. Eisenberg are true professionals.  They will give you a thorough, comprehensive exam and have been especially helpful to me given my complicated eye issues.  I also highly recommend their Eye Glasses Boutique.  Vita is amazingly talented at helping you find just the right frame for your face.  High end product and service. And, everyone there is professional, courteous and friendly from the reception desk to the doctor's office.
(I am receiving absolutely no benefit or discount for this review.)

originalText.text: Dr. Eisenberg is very thorough and she explains every detail.  The front desk staff are also thorough in explaining about insurance coverage, etc.  Wait time is kept to a minimum, and the exams are quick yet not rushed.  I am so happy to have found an eye doctor close to work.
